title: Authentication issues for people in and around the Denver, Colorado area
body:
Even though my trace route dropped the connection at this node, I was just now able to successfully login and apply the patch. I was also greeted with a brand new Honor 4 notification :D

Hope everyone is now able to login successfully. Cheers

replies.body: Ayyyyyy hopefully that means that these issues are clearing up. Congrats on Honor 4 too!!!!
Lets hope so haha!, and thank you  :)
